meanings.definition: To eject from the stomach through the mouth; vomit.
meanings.sent1: After eating too much candy, she felt sick and had to spue in the bathroom.
meanings.sent2: The cat must have eaten something bad because it started to spue on the carpet.
meanings.sent3: The birthday clown accidentally spued all over his colorful costume during the party.
meanings.sent4: The overflowing river seemed to spue water endlessly into the valley below.
meanings.sent5: The volcano began to spue hot lava, creating a dangerous situation for the nearby villagers.
